00001 /*
00002  * RmGlobalMap.h
00003  * 
00004  * Defines:
00005  * - class RmGlobalMap : public RmSonarMap
00006  * 
00007  * Purpose:
00008  * See class documentation.
00009  *
00010  * Author:
00011  * Capt Kevin Owens
00012  * Air Force Institute of Technology
00013  *
00014  * Revisions:
00015  * 21 Nov 2004: created, with update(), clear(), put(), operator<<(), installNewMap()
00016  * 22 Nov 2004: extended to include width(), height(), bound()
00017  * 23 Nov 2004: added clear(), integrate()
00018  * 24 Nov 2004: completed localize() test method that repeatedly shifts and rotates the local maps
00019  *                              changed m_globalMap from RmBayesCertaintyGrid to RmMutableCartesianGrid<float>
00020  * 30 Nov 2004: cppdoc
00021  * 15 Dec 2004: added integrate( RmLocalMap* )
00022  * 20 Dec 2004: inherited from RmMutableCartesianGrid<float>
00023  *
00024  *
00025  * Notes:
00026  * 
00027  * how will be used
00028  * x outputs string of coord-value pairs for use by viewer
00029  * - feed into EM, in what format?
00030  * - feed into vfh?
00031  * - convert to polylines as whole
00032  * 
00033  * reponsible for
00034  * x growing collection of local maps from single sonar feed
00035  *   x distance is tracked internally
00036  * - real time localization of local maps (via localization of robot pose)
00037  * - stored as relative to previous map
00038  *   - and/or absolute (cummulative)
00039  * x integrate local maps into single map (or giving the appearance of such)
00040  *   x map global xy coords to one or more local maps (when they overlap)
00041  *   x probabilities from overlapping maps should be ... averaged?
00042  *   x or combine into single grid
00043  * x incoming sonar readings must be adjusted by absolute localization amount for current local map
00044  * 
00045  * interface with map viewer application
00046  * x continues to request update using single sonar reading
00047  * - global map returns string of all affected cells, including those from localization
00048  *   of previous local maps (would at most redraw bounding rectangle of all changes)
00049  */
